parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns ammo count of given type from given turret 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Broken when vehicle has multiple magazines of the same type</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[magazineTurretAmmo]] [magazineClass, turretPath]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineClass, turretPath]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>vehicle [[player]] [[magazineTurretAmmo]] ["cls", [0]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMagazineTurretAmmo]],[[magazinesAllTurrets]],[[ammoOnPylon]]
</value></part></template></root>
